definition: business profit/auspicious/lucky/small sum of money offered on festive days
surname Li
sharp/favorable/advantage/benefit/profit/interest/to do good to/to benefit
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]
(old) to burn paper money as an offering

sentences.english: Many companies tapped into the cheap labor of this country to make a fortune.
sentences.chinese: 许多公司利用了这个国家便宜的人工来大发利市。

sentences.english: Try because he did. he couldn't finish the task successfully.
sentences.chinese: 不论奈何勤苦，他都不能利市地完成那个任务。

sentences.english: Whether he will also be able to claim to know those of the good burghers of celebrity-studded Neuilly is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 然而，马提龙能否拉拢纽利市的知名人士还是一个谜。
